comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Since I have no chance of setting a record for the climb up Flagstaff, I think I'm going to set my sights on a record for descending Flagstaff. Who wants to be my co-pilot?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Texting from the deliberation room, which, I suppose, is technically against the rules. We're not to discuss this case w/ _anyone_, although, if you ask me, the dude's guilty as sin. I mean it's all on the table right there in front of us, wrapped and tagged in state's-evidence Baggies... the catcher's mitt, the note, the Swiss Army knife, and the penicillin tabs. And the alibi is about as watertight as used cheesecloth. _At choir practice_ my dyin' butt. The dude's guilty. Main reason I want to nail this guy, though? The stupid Sam Adams tattoo. I _hate_ Sam Adams. Screw the evidence. Uh oh... gotta' run. The bailiff's giving me that look again. Manana, DU
